Title: reverse engineering with R2
Description:
Watch me do that fancy stuff and password cracking and hacking pacman emoticon pacman emoticon (actually I recorded it because I just wanted to test my new shell recording capabilities )
enjoy...and for those who will ask
r2 is radare2
that crackme I got it over the internet
aa and aaa means analyse all
pdf means print disassembled function
pd means (non surprisingly) print disassebled from the current possition
dc means debugger continue
dr means print debugger registers
ds means debugger strep into
dso means debugger step over
rax2 is the programmer's calculator to convert through different bases
